General.Name: Diamond Food Indonesia PT
General.Description: PT Diamond Food Indonesia Tbk manufactures and distributes consumer goods in Indonesia. Its products include milk and cheese products, juices, chocolates, yogurts, ice creams, dressings, as well as other products, such as toppings and creamidor. The company is also involved in the production and processing of dairy-based products and frozen food products; trading and distribution of food and beverage products, and non-food equipment and supplies; retail of food and beverage products; and operation of Web portals and/or digital platforms. PT Diamond Food Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1995 and is based in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.
General.Address: Gedung TCC Batavia Tower One, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10220
